EXTRACTED VALUE: Excellent production values but lacking the depth of our favourite beat-'em-ups. [Oct 2008, p.81]
A great debut for the Xbox 360 as it gives its gamers everything you’d want from the series the first time out of the box.
NASCAR 08 is a decent effort at bringing this series to the next-gen platforms, but ultimately doesn’t have the muscle to be a first-place finisher.
Superman Returns isn't a bad game, but at six hours gameplay it's far too short, as well as far too buggy and repetitive to enjoy to its fullest.
